Description: Fragment of rim of Attic pottery column-krater; inside and outside of neck glazed; ivy leaf band on outside of rim, interlinked lotus-bud frieze on top.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Antikenmuseum, Heidelberg. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Heidelberg, Antikenmuseum I52-I77 and I85-I92 have in the past been erroneously known and cited as J52-77 and J85-92. There are now two sherds I85.
Bibliographic references: CVA Heidelberg IV / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum Deutschland Heidelberg, Universität (p.50 pl. 166.3 and 4)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0976)
